mapper.select: SELECT U.id AS user_id , U.role , U.status , U.email , U.nickname , U.phone_number , U.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = U.file_id ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1) AS image_file_url , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY WHERE seller_id = U.id OR buyer_id = U.id) AS trade_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_USER_COMPLIMENT WHERE complimented_user_id = U.id) AS compliment_count , U.last_login_at , U.created_at FROM USER U WHERE U.id = #{userId}
SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = (SELECT file_id FROM USER WHERE id = #{userId}) ORDER BY created_At DESC LIMIT 1
